articles.description: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk does not believe team-mate Trent Alexander-Arnold's poor performance against Manchester United was because the right-back was impacted by talk about his future.
articles.title: Talk of future did not impact Trent Alexander-Arnold - Virgil van Dijk

articles.description: South Africa finally break Pakistan's resistance on the fourth day of the second Test to complete a 2-0 series win and finish top of the World Test Championship table.
articles.title: South Africa finish top of WTC table after convincing win over Pakistan

articles.description: The Jacksonville Jaguars sack Doug Pederson after three seasons as their head coach.
articles.title: NFL: Jacksonville Jaguars sack head coach Doug Pederson after three seasons

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he still has "trauma" when he visits Melbourne, three years after being deported because of Covid-19 rules.
articles.title: Australian Open: Novak Djokovic still has 'trauma' over Melbourne Covid deportation

articles.description: This geographically misplaced match, with the most anodyne of names, has a value that might help nudge Europe to a rare away win over the US next September, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Europe's Ryder Cup hopes boosted by January's 'Team Cup' in Abu Dhabi

articles.description: BBC Sport and data analysts CricViz look at five talking points from the Australia and India series and what England can learn about their next two opponents.
articles.title: India cricket: What did we learn from tour of Australia?

articles.description: Ireland prop Tom O'Toole will miss the first two Six Nations games against England and Scotland after receiving a six-game ban following his red card against Munster.
articles.title: Six Nations: Ulster prop Tom O'Toole to miss Ireland's first two games as part of six-match ban

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says Tomorrow's Golf League (TGL), the technology-driven tournament he is fronting with Tiger Woods, will take golf "into the 21st century".
articles.title: TGL: 'Golf reimagined' - Rory McIlroy and Tiger Woods' tech-driven league begins

articles.description: BBC Sport explores why some Liverpool fans were hostile towards Trent Alexander-Arnold during Sunday's 2-2 draw with Manchester United at Anfield.
articles.title: Trent Alexander Arnold fan abuse: Could Real Madrid transfer speculation harm Liverpool?

articles.description: Detroit earn the NFC top seed, while Tampa Bay and Denver secure the final two play-off spots on the final Sunday of the regular season.
articles.title: NFL results & week 18 recap: Detroit Lions grab top seed, Denver Broncos & Tampa Bay Buccaneers clinch play-off spots
